title: ValidationOutcome
description: The output from a Guard execution.

call_id.description: Foreign key to the most recent Call this resulted from.

rawLlmOutput.description: The raw, unchanged string content from the LLM call.

validatedOutput.description: The validated, and potentially fixed, output from the LLM call after undergoing validation.

reask.description: If validation continuously fails and all allocated reasks are used, this field will contain the final reask that would have been sent to the LLM if additional reasks were available.

validationPassed.description: A boolean to indicate whether or not the LLM output passed validation.  If this is False, the validated_output may be invalid.

error.description: If the validation process raised a handleable exception, this field will contain the error message.
